member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.Dither
member.summary: Specifies whether the image should be dithered when saving to a black and white output format such as CCITT3. If is RLE or None (indicating color output) this property has no effect.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.DpiX
member.summary: Get or set the horizonal resolution value when exporting a TIFF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.DpiY
member.summary: Get or set the vertical resolution value when exporting a TIFF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.Pagination

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.PageController.PageController
member.devdoc: Impelemets additional functionality for implementations. Used to perform rendering with transfromations under resulted rendered pages.

devdoc.summary: Renders physical page applying specified transformation.
devdoc.param: Number of physical page to render.
This RectangleF should have Left property is set to Left Margin Value, Width Property is set to the Factor used to scale the page.
Count of pages of rendered report.
devdoc.returns: Number of last rendered logical page.

devdoc.summary: Returns 1 based number of physical page that logical page is rendered on and location of logical page on physical page.
devdoc.param: Zero based number of logical page to return destination for.
Original area that logical page should be rendered.
Page size defined by the report.
devdoc.returns: that contains 1 based number of physical page that logical page is rendered on and location of logical page on physical page.

devdoc.summary: Delegate that should be implemented in each RenderingExtension that uses PageController functionality.
